sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import { useEffect } from "react"; import cf from "./Images/CF logo.png"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; export default function Navbar() { useEffect(() => { let nav = document.querySelector("nav"); window.addEventListener("scroll", function () { if (window.pageYOffset > 100) { nav.classList.add("bg-warning", "shadow"); } else { nav.classList.remove("bg-warning", "shadow"); } }); }, []); return ( <>

); }
